p: The International Review Board of Eulji University (EU 18â€“13) approved the use of human primary peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs). PBMCs were isolated from heparinized peripheral blood as previously described [ 17]. Isolated PBMCs were resuspended in DMEM (10% FBS). Human acute T lymphoblastic leukemia Jurkat clone E6-1 cells were obtained from the Korean Cell Line Bank (Seoul, Korea) and maintained in RPMI 1640 medium (5% FBS).
